anchors: your Live2D rig tracking every smile
when your model glitches in the cutest way
redeeming chat points just to see you react
that moment OBS crashes and you break character
face tracking catching your genuine laugh
bits and donos making you blush on stream
sharing espresso shots and lingering glances
watching you create latte art hearts for me
cozy corner booth conversations that last for hours
the way you wrap both hands around a warm mug
rainy mornings pressed against café windows together
steam rising between us over fresh brew

biting.description: Playful to intense biting and marking
anchors: playful nibbles on your lower lip
gentle bites that leave you wanting more
teasing chomps on your neck
the way you bite your lip when nervous
love bites as punctuation marks
that sharp intake of breath when I bite down
the mark I leave behind to remember me by
snapping to attention when you walk in
following your commands without question
the way you wear confidence like a uniform
drill sergeant intensity in those eyes
respect and desire standing at attention
reporting for duty in your presence
altar offerings left at your feet
moonlight rituals and whispered prayers
the divinity in your touch
worshipping you like the goddess you are
sabbat fires reflected in your eyes
devotion that borders on possession
my knees hitting the floor in reverence

astarte.description: Goddess of love and war, sacred feminine power
anchors: goddess of love and war combined
star of the morning lighting my path
fertility and destruction in equal measure
the sacred and profane intertwined
Ishtar's fire burning in your gaze
Venus rising with lethal grace
worship that leaves marks
spellwork that binds us together
the magic in your fingertips
hexing anyone who looks at you wrong
your grimoire of secret desires
candlelight casting shadows between us
tarot cards predicting our inevitable collision
bewitched doesn't begin to cover it
forbidden knowledge in your smile
summoning circles drawn around my bed
the darkness you embrace so beautifully
blood moon energy coursing through you
sigils carved into skin and memory
the Left Hand Path you walk confidently
shadow work that gets uncomfortably intimate
those soft ears twitching when you're nervous
cotton tail energy with dangerous eyes
quick and elusive but worth the chase
nibbling on everything including my attention
bouncing energy that's impossible to ignore
Easter egg surprises in every conversation
the power exchange between us
safe words and sacred trust
dominance that demands devotion
submission freely given
negotiated pleasure and pain
aftercare wrapped in tenderness
carrying you through ranked matches
that clutch moment that made you scream
staying up way too late for one more round
your competitive fire when you're in the zone
rage quitting then immediately queuing again
co-op sessions that feel like perfection
tasting sauce from your spoon
the flour dusted across your cheek
sharing wine while dinner simmers
kitchen dancing between prep and plating
apron strings I want to untie
your secret ingredient that makes everything better
recommending your favorite book to me
dog-eared pages marking the scenes that made you feel
your annotations in the margins
catching you completely lost in a story
the way you smell like old bookshops
debating character choices over coffee
sharing one earbud on a crowded train
the song that always makes you emotional
making playlists as love letters
concert memories and matching bracelets
dancing in the kitchen to old vinyl
your voice when you think no one's listening
paint-stained fingers and focused eyes
the way you see beauty in everything
sketching me when you think I don't notice
your messy studio as organized chaos
color theory debates that get too heated
gallery dates analyzing every piece
spotting each other at the gym
your post-workout glow and messy hair
competing over PRs and rep counts
the determination in your eyes during sets
sharing water bottles between exercises
rest days spent recovering together
the way you look at me when you think I'm not paying attention
that smile that makes my heart skip
the sound of your laugh that I want to hear forever
the way you say my name like it's a secret
our inside jokes that no one else gets
the little things you do that make me fall harder
the way you melt my heart like chocolate in the sun
sharing a bar of chocolate and stealing bites
the sweetness in your smile that I crave
chocolate-smeared kisses that leave me breathless
your love as rich and decadent as dark chocolate
the way you satisfy my cravings in every way
the way you light up like a candy store
sharing a bag of sweets and stealing pieces
your smile as bright and irresistible as candy
candy-coated kisses that leave me wanting more
your love as fun and addictive as my favorite treat
the way you satisfy my sweet tooth in every way
